articles.author: Adam Rogers
articles.title: The Olympics Could Be a Covid-19 ‘Super-Evolutionary Event’
articles.description: In a warped version of international cooperation, the Games could provide a place for variants of the virus to spread and then return home with athletes.
articles.content: As for the Olympic-bound folks already testing positive, McCloskey said that didnt constitute a failure in the system. Quite the oppositeeach one represented the cutting-off of a more infectious time… [+4525 chars]

articles.title: Covid Is Pulling the Plug on Beloved Japanese Arcades
articles.description: Once home to vibrant live competitions, gaming centers have been bleeding out since before the pandemic. Lockdowns could leave them KO'd for good.
articles.content:

articles.title: Amazon is now selling its own Covid-19 test kits for $39.99 in the U.S.

articles.title: Facebook will require US office employees to be vaccinated
